acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped float values with @PodamFloatValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleFloatValuesWithThePodamFloatValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.FloatValuePojo

Then the Pojo FloatRangeValuesPojo ( floatFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 floatFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 86.513 floatFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 976.63007 floatFieldWithPreciseValue = 123456.0 floatObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 floatObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 95.57347 floatObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 61.771793 floatObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 123456.0 ) should not be null
Then the Float value 0.0 should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the float value 86.513 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the float value 976.63007 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the Pojo 0.0 should not be null
Then the Float value 0.0 should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the Pojo 95.57347 should not be null
Then the float value 95.57347 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the Pojo 61.771793 should not be null
Then the float value 61.771793 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the float value 123456.0 should be precisely 123456.0
Then the Pojo 123456.0 should not be null
Then the float value 123456.0 should be precisely 123456.0
